Question.Subject: Chatango shut down? Is this really true?
Question.ChosenAnswer: idk...i hope it's still up. jeez what a bummer. im gonna pray to god it comes back up o.o'

Answer.Content: I just heard today(even though others have heard from a much longer time ago) that they have/are shutting down and have moved the Chattanga, but I'm not really sure. Chattanga's connection seems to be bad right now, so its hard to know.
idk...i hope it's still up. jeez what a bummer. im gonna pray to god it comes back up o.o'
